CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A low band - gap copolymer consisting of 9,10-thienyl-substituted anthracene ( TA ) as an electron - donating unit and diketopyrrolopyrrole ( DPP ) as an electron - withdrawing unit has been synthesized and applied to the donor material in polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A low band - gap copolymer consisting of 9,10-thienyl-substituted anthracene ( TA ) as an electron - donating unit and diketopyrrolopyrrole ( DPP ) as an electron - withdrawing unit has been synthesized and applied to the donor material in polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| low band-gap copolymer |
| consisting of 9,10-thienyl-substituted anthracene (TA) |
| as an electron - donating unit |
| and diketopyrrolopyrrole (DPP) |
| as an electron - withdrawing unit |
| synthesized |
| applied to the donor material |
| in polymer solar cells. |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| low band-gap copolymer |
| consisting of 9,10-thienyl-substituted anthracene (TA) as an electron donating unit |
| and diketopyrrolopyrrole (DPP) as an electron withdrawing unit |
| synthesized |
| applied to the donor material |
| in polymer solar cells. |

The entities "electron donating unit" and "electron withdrawing unit" can be considered material properties as they describe the functional role of the TA and DPP units in the copolymer.
